data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in Cerezo.
In the minute 2, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Oita, close to Cerezo's area.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Free kick Cerezo.
In the minute 10, Hiroshi Kiyotake is on target to give Cerezo a 0-1 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Tatsuhiro Sakamoto.
Oita needs to be cautious. Cerezo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Throw-in for Oita close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 19, Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Oita throw-in in Cerezo's half.
In the minute 21, Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Oita.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
In the minute 28, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Oita a goal kick.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 32, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Cerezo.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Oita in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 34, Oita push upfield and Kei Chinen gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Cerezo defence.
Throw-in for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Oita.
In the minute 40, Oita to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Kei Chinen of Oita smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Oita.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
The first-half has come to a close in Oita.
The second-half is now underway.
Bruno Pereira Mendes for the away team is judged to be offside.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Oita make their first substitution with Tatsuya Tanaka replacing Ryosuke Tone.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Rei Matsumoto (Oita) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Cerezo's Hiroshi Kiyotake is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Yuki Kobayashi is replacing Toshio Shimakawa for the home team.
Tomohiro Katanosaka (Oita) is making a third substitution, with Yuya Takazawa replacing Yamato Machida.
Corner awarded to Oita.
In the minute 65, Can Oita capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cerezo's half?
Throw-in for Cerezo at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Oita's Tomoki Iwata gets in a shot on goal at Showa Denko Dome Oita. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 68, Yuya Takazawa of Oita gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 73, Cerezo have a dangerous throw-in.
The away team replace Eiichi Katayama with Ayumu Seko.
Cerezo push forward at Showa Denko Dome Oita and Ayumu Seko gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Oita defence.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Oita.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Oita.
Oita's Yuya Takazawa goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 78, The home team have replaced Kei Chinen with Kohei Isa. This is the fourth substitution made today by Tomohiro Katanosaka.
Keita Takahata is on a sub for Rei Matsumoto for Oita.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in high up the field for Cerezo in Oita.
Cerezo make their second substitution with Yuta Toyokawa replacing Hiroshi Kiyotake.
In Oita, Bruno Pereira Mendes (Cerezo) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 82, Oita have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
Oita have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 85, Oita have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In Oita, Cerezo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In Oita Cerezo attack through Yuta Toyokawa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 86, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Oita a goal kick.
Throw-in Oita.
The away team replace Bruno Pereira Mendes with Yoichiro Kakitani.
In the minute 88, Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Oita.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Cerezo throw-in in Oita's half.
Can Cerezo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Oita's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Oita. The final score is 0-1.
